chunk:
Three Ships Replenish Ceramides + Blueberry Barrier Repair Serum

Brand: Three Ships

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment
book: 0313-Three Ships Replenish Ceramides + Blueberry Barrier Repair Serum

chunk: Ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propanediol, Glycerin, Vaccinium Myrtillus (Blueberry) Seed Oil, Ceramide NP, Opuntia Ficus Indica (Prickly Pear) Oil, Sodium Citrate, Polyglyceryl-3 Dicitrate/Stearate, Xanthan Gum, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Glyceryl Caprylate, Tocopherol, Citric Acid
book: 0313-Three Ships Replenish Ceramides + Blueberry Barrier Repair Serum

chunk:
Directions: Apply 2-4 drops to clean skin morning and night, after cleansing and before moisturizing. 
Appliquer deux quatre gouttes sur une peau propre matin et soir. Utiliser apr s le nettoyage et avant l hydratant.
